author: parithosh
content: Reporting back, the prsym-geth local devnet has now been fine for ~4d. I think last time we saw issues around the 5d mark, but 100% perf the entire time is a good sign tbh ðŸ˜„

author: parithosh
content:
So once Jimmy is ready with a lighthouse image, I'd love to try that out in a mixed devnet ðŸ˜„
Perhaps if we find something, then the peerDAS call tomorrow is the perfect avenue to discuss it

author: manunlp
content:
Amazing. By any chance did you use these flags?
- `--data-columns-withhold-count`
- `--data-columns-ignore-slot-multiple`

author: parithosh
content:
used this config from you ðŸ™‚
```
participants_matrix:
  el:
    - el_type: geth
  cl:
      - cl_type: prysm
        cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS-revert-failing-commit-develop-d545409
        vc_image: ethpandaops/prysm-validator:peerDAS-revert-failing-commit-develop-d545409
        cl_max_mem: 4096
        count: 2
        cl_extra_params:
          - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
          - --subscribe-all-subnets
          - --log-format=json
        vc_extra_params:
          - --log-format=json
      - cl_type: prysm
        count: 1
        cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS-revert-failing-commit-develop-d545409
        vc_image: ethpandaops/prysm-validator:peerDAS-revert-failing-commit-develop-d545409
        cl_max_mem: 4096
        cl_extra_params:
          - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
          - --log-format=json
          - --data-columns-withhold-count=64
        vc_extra_params:
          - --log-format=json
      - cl_type: prysm
        count: 1
        cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS-revert-failing-commit-develop-d545409
        vc_image: ethpandaops/prysm-validator:peerDAS-revert-failing-commit-develop-d545409
        cl_max_mem: 4096
        cl_extra_params:
          - --data-columns-ignore-slot-multiple=20
          - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
          - --log-format=json
        vc_extra_params:
          - --log-format=json
network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  fulu_fork_epoch: 2
snooper_enabled: true
global_log_level: debug
additional_services:
  - dora
  - spamoor_blob
  - prometheus_grafana
dora_params:
  image: ethpandaops/dora:fulu-support
ethereum_metrics_exporter_enabled: true
```

author: manunlp
content:
Oh ok so there is these 2 options. I'm really glad to see the network is surviving to the quite aggressive `--data-columns-ignore-slot-multiple=20` option for multiple days ðŸ™‚

Thanks!
